t: Secure IoT Gateway, IoT Gateway Device - AWS IoT Core - AWS
s: 5 days ago - AWS IoT Core enables secure two-way communication between internet-connected devices and AWS services with device gateway and device SDK capabilities.

t: Securely Connect IoT Devices – AWS IoT Core Pricing – Amazon Web Services
s: AWS IoT Core is a platform that enables you to connect devices to AWS Services and other devices, secure data and interactions, process and act upon device data, and enable applications to interact with devices even when they are offline. Explore the key features.

t: AWS IoT Core Features
s: 5 days ago - The AWS IoT Device SDK lets you more easily and more quickly connect your hardware device or mobile application to AWS IoT Core. The AWS IoT Device SDK helps your devices connect, authenticate, and exchange messages with AWS IoT Core using the MQTT, HTTP, or WebSockets protocols.

t: AWS IoT Device Management Pricing - Amazon Web Services
s: Managed integrations for AWS IoT Device Management allows you to onboard and control devices across multiple brands and connectivity protocols. Your managed integrations costs include a fixed monthly subscription fee per device and a messaging fee based on monthly message volume per device.
